welcome-message.p1: Welcome to Plannyx, the ideal tool for smooth project organization and task management.
welcome-message.p2: Plan and manage your tasks with ease, and get ready to boost your productivity!

benefits.1: Plan your personal and professional projects.
benefits.3: Stay organized with deadlines and helpful reminders.
benefits.4: Keep track of your to-do lists.
benefits.5: Visualize your tasks seamlessly through your personal calendar.
benefits.6: Monitor your progress with a detailed dashboard.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.verify-email: Please verify your email address in order to log in.
signup.verify-email-description: A verification email has been sent to your email address. Please click on the link provided in the email to verify your account and be able to log in.
signup.email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use by another account.
signup.password-requirements: Password must be at least 6 characters, include at least one uppercase character and one special symbol.
signup.could-not-create-account: Could not create account. Please try again later.

logout.message: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout.failed-to-logout: Failed to log out. Please try again later.

404.title: Page not found.
404.message: Could not find the resource or page you were looking for.

access-denied.title: Access denied.
access-denied.message: You do not have permission to access this page or resource.

new-project.end-date-after-start-date: The end date can't be before than the start date.

new-project.could-not-add-project: Could not add project. Please try again later.

projects-notifications.no-projects-starting-ending-soon: There are no projects starting or ending soon.

calendar.no-projects: The calendar will be displayed here once you have created some projects.
